Package com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel.tasks

Contains interfaces and classes needed for tasks using RoboticsAPI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IMultiInstanceTaskAccessor User task representation.
IRoboticsAPIBackgroundTask RoboticsAPI background task interface.
IRoboticsAPITask RoboticsAPI basic task interface.
IRoboticsAPITaskManager Interface for accessing and managing tasks and applications in the RoboticsAPI.
ISingleInstanceTaskAccessor User task representation.
ITaskAccessor User task representation.
ITaskEngine Interface for task engines.
ITaskFunction Marker interface for task function implementors.
ITaskFunctionAccessor<T extends ITaskFunction> Accessor to a task function.
ITaskFunctionProvider Interface for task that provide functions.
ITaskInstance Task instance representation.
ITaskLogger RoboticsAPI logging interface to be used by tasks.
ITaskManager Task manager interface.
 

Class Summary
RoboticsAPIBackgroundTask Base class for RoboticsAPI background task.
RoboticsAPICyclicBackgroundTask Base class for cyclic background tasks.
RoboticsAPITask Base class for RoboticsAPI tasks.
RoboticsAPITaskEngine Robotics api task engine.
 

Enum Summary
CycleBehavior Defines the behavior of a cyclic task if the execution of a cyclic method takes longer than the given period time.
RoboticsAPITaskStartType Supported start types for KUKA BackgroundTasks.
UserTaskState Represents the state of a user task.
 

Exception Summary
CycleExceededException Thrown when execution of cyclic task method takes longer than the specified period time of a cyclic task.
CyclicTaskException Exception that is thrown if cyclic background task is ended because of unhandled exception in RoboticsAPICyclicBackgroundTask.runCyclic() method.
 

Annotation Types Summary
ProvidedFunctions Declares functions provided by the annotated task.
 

Package com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel.tasks Description

Contains interfaces and classes needed for tasks using RoboticsAPI.
